Package game.economy.runes.manager

Class RuneManager

java.lang.Object
game.economy.runes.manager.RuneManager
public class RuneManager
extends java.lang.Object
Registry & Singleton class RuneManager could be segregated into its respective parts if it continues to grow. Segregation could be done with composition over inheritance.
Author:
Kok Tim Ming

      rune - Rune to pick up
